description: |
  A PluginToolbar object is created by calling the
  Class.Plugin:CreateToolbar() method and is used to contain
  Class.PluginToolbarButton|PluginToolbarButtons.

  - Instance

methods:
  - name: PluginToolbar:CreateButton
    summary: |
      Creates a Class.PluginToolbarButton that allows the user to initiate a
      single, one-off action in Studio.
    description: |
      Creates a Class.PluginToolbarButton that allows the user to initiate a
      single, one-off action in Studio through its
      Class.PluginToolbarButton.Click|Click event.
    codesamples:
      - adding-a-plugin-toolbar-button
    parameters:
      - name: buttonId
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          A unique button ID.
      - name: tooltip
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The text displayed in the tooltip shown when a user hovers over the
          button.
      - name: iconname
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The asset ID of the icon displayed in the button.
      - name: text
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          Optional text displayed under the button icon.
    returns:
      - type: PluginToolbarButton
        summary: |
          The created Class.PluginToolbarButton instance.
